agenda_items.title: Approval of the December 5, 2025, Community Development Commission Meeting Minutes
Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: Overview of FY 2023-24 Community Development Commission Annual Report, Community Development Block Grant: Timely Expenditure of Funds, and the FY 2025-26 HUD Budget Development Process.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public; introduction of new commission members; additions/changes to committee assignments, scheduling of committee meetings and consideration of future agenda item.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report includes general acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: CDC Financial Monitoring/Performance Standards Committee Report(s)
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve the FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Extensions and Reprogramming Funds Recommendations.

agenda_items.title: Announcement
agenda_items.description: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; Information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition of public officials, employees, or citizens.

financial_items.description: FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Extensions and Reprogramming Funds Recommendations
